Mintz.from sentence: Mintz : Multi-class logistic regression model proposed by for distant supervision paradigm .

MIMLRE.from sentence:
MultiR : Probabilistic graphical model for multi instance learning by MIMLRE :
A graphical model which jointly models multiple instances and multiple labels .

PCNN.from sentence: More details in . PCNN : A CNN based relation extraction model by which uses piecewise max - pooling for sentence representation .

PCNN + ATT.from sentence: PCNN + ATT : A piecewise max - pooling over CNN based model which is used by to get sentence representation followed by attention over sentences .
